title: Cheese Vegetable and Potato Soup
ingredients: ['1.5 litres water', '1 medium onion, chopped', '4 medium potatoes, chopped', '150g frozen broccoli florets', '1 cube chicken stock', '1 (295g) tin cream of mushroom condensed soup', '1 (295g) tin cream of chicken condensed soup', '1 (295g) tin cream of celery condensed soup', '900g processed cheese, such as Kraft singles, unwrapped and chopped', '150g frozen carrots', '150g frozen cauliflower florets']
